data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. É loozu ga kooleiti. Davide ná-guyei.
Ɠida nà-kpee loligi wu, nà-masagi, nà-GALAGI,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, gosui, ɗa ɗa gòoi mɛni,
Mazɔlɔɔ è la ga GALAGI, nii faa ɲɔi nɛai bɛ.
Ɠimalala nuiti ti la zooga ti ʋa lo è ɠaazu,
Ɗa zɛɛ wo nuiti kpein undaaʋili.
Ɗa-wooɠɛɠilada wolai ʋɔ, nii kpela ge la ba,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, lo tùɠɔ ɗa-lelebodai zu, sìli nuiti maaʋele ma.
Mazɔlɔɔ nu nɔpɛ ge la laa ti-wooiti da,
Ee, GALA, ti leve ga faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti, è ti zo ɠana!
Kɛlɛ niiti kpein ti lɔɔɠuzu è ʋɔ bɛ, ta ɠoozunɛ è ʋɔ.
Mazɔlɔɔ ɗɔun ɗa, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa tuya loo telebo nui ʋɛ.
